Cart Items

{{product.name}}
{{product.quantity + 1}}
{{ product.price}}
Sub-Total
2 items
${{subTotal}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ProductService } from 'src/app/services/product.service'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/services/shared.service'; import { Product } from '../../product-list/product.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sale', templateUrl: './sale.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sale.component.css'] }) export class SaleComponent implements OnInit { // products:any[] = []; public data :Product[] = []; cartProducts: any[] = []; subTotal: number = 0; constructor(private productService: ProductService, private sharedService:SharedService) { debugger; } ngOnInit(){ this.loadCart(); this.sharedService.currentValue.subscribe(value => {this.productss = value} ); } loadCart() { this.subTotal = 0; this.productService.getCartItemsByCustId(1).subscribe((res: any) => { this.cartProducts = res.data; this.cartProducts.forEach(element => { this.subTotal = this.subTotal + element.productPrice; }); debugger; }) } RemoveItem(id: number) { this.productService.removeCartItemById(id).subscribe((res: any) => { if (res.result) { this.loadCart(); this.productService.cartAddedSubject.next(true); } }) } // makeSale() { // this.saleObj.TotalInvoiceAmount = this.subTotal; // this.productService.cartAddedSubject.next(true); // this.productService.makeSale( this.saleObj).subscribe((res: any) => { // if (res.result) { // alert("Sale Success") // this.loadCart(); // this.productService.cartAddedSubject.next(true); // } // }) // } }
